description: Helps improve liver and kidney function, eliminate toxins from the body, improve digestion, and normalize metabolism.

title: Walks in the forest or nature (once a week)
description: Walks in fresh air help reduce stress levels, improve mood, and contribute to overall wellness.

title: Screen-free day (once a week)
description: A full day without screens helps rest from gadgets, improves sleep quality, and reduces stress.

title: Reading books (every other day)
description: Reading helps relax, develop cognitive abilities, and reduce stress levels.

title: Social media detox (every other day)
description: Spend the day without social media to improve emotional well-being and reduce stress.

title: Caffeine-free day (once a week)

description: This relaxing practice helps relieve muscle tension, improve blood circulation, and relax the body.

title: Self-assessment and journaling (once a week)
description: Journaling helps analyze the past week, record achievements, and set new goals.

description: This improves skin condition, removes dead skin cells, and helps the skin breathe.

description: An important habit for self-improvement that helps focus on your goals and achieve them.

title: Personal finance review (once a month)
